data.text:
@OwenBradley Imminent 
24/48 hours
7/10 working days
4/5 days

All of these words we have heard over and over again. To just save on the disappointment for the fans, just say nothing about the takeover till it's official. Let's just concentrate on keeping pushing to stay in the Championship
@OwenBradley How many times have we heard the same broken record from the administration? I feel for Wayne, the staff and the players, not to mention the fans. Get the job done asap.

@JordanCook8 Because there will still be process/procedures that have to happen. Planning needs to be going on now for next season, but it can’t because we’re in limbo. Even if we exited admin tomorrow, we’d probably still notice next season.
@OwenBradley Don’t understand why in his sky interview he says 4-5 days but also says we might not even have a kit or pitch next season but surely that wouldn’t happen with the takeover 🤷🏼‍♂️
@OwenBradley @AWJThompson @WayneRooney MM is the Only one who gets this done. He is pulling the strings. He is a coward and has gone into hiding. Never forgive him. Don't show your face in Derby!!
@cossie1973 Nothing to do with me, mate. Haven’t heard it 🤷🏻‍♂️

@OwenBradley @WayneRooney Some very disrespectful comments from Ed Dawes on sport scene at 6…Wayne Rooney has proven himself a manager,what he’s done with the players this season as been nothing short of exceptional
